{"id":1038570729,"question_id":2954,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1693667500,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"23 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1038570729/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Sum of Almost Unique Subarray","memory":"48.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long maxSum(List<Integer> nums, int m, int k) {\n        int len = nums.size();\n        \n        long sum =0; \n        long max = 0;\n        \n        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        \n        int st =0;\n        for(int ed=0; ed<len; ed++){\n            \n            int n = nums.get(ed);\n            sum+=n;\n            map.put(n, map.getOrDefault(n,0)+1);\n            \n            if(map.size()<m)\n                continue;\n            // System.out.println(ed + \" \" +st + \" set=\"+ map.keySet());\n            \n            while(ed-st+1>k){\n                int nn = nums.get(st);\n                sum-=nn;\n                // System.out.println(nn + \" \" + map.get(nn));\n                \n                map.put(nn, map.get(nn)-1);\n                if(map.get(nn)==0)\n                    map.remove(nn);\n                st++;\n            }\n            \n            if(map.size()>=m && (ed-st+1==k)){\n                max = Math.max(max, sum);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-sum-of-almost-unique-subarray","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
